sentence.content: Here is a chronology of the Exxon Valdez oil spill, its cleanup and related developments: March 24: The 987-foot tanker Exxon Valdez runs aground on Bligh Reef some 25 miles south of Valdez, Alaska, spilling nearly 11 million gallons of North Slope crude oil into Prince William Sound.
